markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Uncanny Suction](/Feats.aspx?ID=2191) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 60</row>

**Archetype** [Oozemorph](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=84)

**Prerequisites**
[Oozemorph Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2185)

</column>

---

Your limbs produce strange, sucker-like growths that allow you to adhere to walls, objects, and most other surfaces. You gain a climb Speed equal to your half your land Speed (minimum 5 feet). If you have the [Quick Climber](/Feats.aspx?ID=821) feat, your climb Speed is equal to your land Speed. In addition, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC to avoid being [Disarmed](/Actions.aspx?ID=41).
name: Uncanny Suction
